name: A Tour in the Wildlife: Lawachora Reserve Forest

tour_plan.Day 1: Explore the rich biodiversity of Lawachora Reserve Forest.
tour_plan.Day 2: Embark on a guided safari to spot various wildlife species.
tour_plan.Day 3: Enjoy a nature walk and learn about conservation efforts in the reserve.

about_tour: Immerse yourself in the captivating beauty of Lawachora Reserve Forest with our 3-day, 2-night Wildlife Tour. This adventure offers a unique opportunity to witness diverse flora and fauna while contributing to conservation initiatives. Join us for an unforgettable experience in the heart of nature.

name: Bandarban: A Full-Day of Adventure

tour_plan.Day 1: Explore the breathtaking landscapes of Bandarban and engage in thrilling adventure activities.
tour_plan.Day 2: Experience the rich cultural heritage of the region and interact with the local communities.

about_tour: Embark on a full-day adventure in the picturesque landscapes of Bandarban. Immerse yourself in thrilling activities and explore the cultural richness of the region. This tour promises an unforgettable experience for adventure enthusiasts.

name: Brass and Pottery Artisan Lifestyle Experience

tour_plan.Day 1: Immerse yourself in the world of brass and pottery artisans. Explore the traditional craftsmanship and techniques.
tour_plan.Day 2: Experience the vibrant lifestyle of local artisans and witness the creation of unique brass and pottery artifacts.

about_tour: Embark on a cultural journey in Dhaka, exploring the traditional practices of brass and pottery artisans. This 2-day, 1-night experience offers a deep dive into the rich cultural heritage of the region.

name: Cox's Bazar Kayaking
tour_plan: Day 1: Explore the coastal beauty of Cox's Bazar.
Day 2: Enjoy an exhilarating kayaking experience along the shores.
Day 3: Relax and unwind on the picturesque beaches of Cox's Bazar.
about_tour: Embark on a thrilling 3-day adventure with our Cox's Bazar Kayaking tour. Discover the scenic coastal landscapes, indulge in the excitement of kayaking, and unwind on the pristine beaches of one of the world's longest beach destinations.

name: Eco Marine: A Silent River Cruise on Shitolokksha
tour_plan: Day 1: Explore the vibrant city of Dhaka at your leisure.
Day 2: Take a serene river cruise on the Shitolokksha River, surrounded by the tranquility of nature.
about_tour: Embark on a two-day journey with our Eco Marine Silent River Cruise tour. Begin your adventure by exploring the vibrant city of Dhaka at your leisure, followed by a day of relaxation and natural beauty with a serene river cruise on the Shitolokksha River.

name: Going Back in the History: Jamdani Weaving, Panam City & Sonargaon Museum
tour_plan: Day 1: Explore the rich history of Jamdani Weaving, Panam City, and Sonargaon Museum in Dhaka.
about_tour: Embark on a fascinating day trip to explore the historical treasures of Dhaka. Immerse yourself in the art of Jamdani Weaving, stroll through the ancient streets of Panam City, and delve into the cultural heritage at Sonargaon Museum.

name: Honey Hunting at Sundarbans
tour_plan: Day 1: Experience the unique wildlife of Sundarbans.
Day 2: Engage in thrilling honey hunting activities amidst the lush mangroves.
about_tour: Embark on a 2-day wildlife adventure in the Sundarbans. Explore the diverse flora and fauna on the first day, and on the second day, experience the thrill of honey hunting amidst the lush mangroves.

name: Jaflong & Lalakhal: A Day of Sylhet Exploration
tour_plan: Day 1: Explore the vibrant markets and cultural landmarks of Sylhet.
Day 2: Embark on a scenic journey through the waterways and visit local attractions.
Day 3: Conclude the trip with a relaxing day, exploring nature and enjoying local cuisine.
about_tour: Immerse yourself in the enchanting landscapes and rich culture of Sylhet over a 3-day waterways exploration. From bustling markets to serene waterways, this tour offers a comprehensive experience of the region's beauty and heritage.

name: Otter fishing: A Thousand-Year-Old Expedition
tour_plan: Day 1: Engage in the ancient art of otter fishing in the beautiful surroundings of Narail.
Day 2: Explore the local culture and enjoy the natural beauty of Narail.
about_tour: Join us on a 2-day journey to Narail, where you'll experience the traditional art of otter fishing, a practice that has been passed down for generations.

name: Parasailing at Cox's Bazar
tour_plan: Day 1: Soar above the stunning beaches of Cox's Bazar with an exhilarating parasailing experience.
about_tour: Take your adventure to new heights with a thrilling day of parasailing at Cox's Bazar. Enjoy breathtaking views of the expansive beaches and azure waters.

name: Promodini Boat Life: Rangamati on House Boat
tour_plan: Day 1: Experience a day of tranquility on a houseboat journey through the scenic beauty of Rangamati.
about_tour: Spend a day in serene luxury with a houseboat tour in Rangamati. Navigate through the tranquil waters and immerse yourself in the breathtaking landscapes.

name: Sundarbans Community Tourism at Gol Kanon Eco Lodge
tour_plan: Day 1: Immerse yourself in the local Sundarbans community at Gol Kanon Eco Lodge.
Day 2: Explore the unique lifestyle and natural wonders of Sundarbans.
about_tour: Embark on a 2-day journey to Gol Kanon Eco Lodge in Sundarbans, where you'll experience community tourism, connect with locals, and witness the natural beauty of the region.

name: Sylhet Day Tour: Ratargul & Bholaganj Sada Pathor
tour_plan: Day 1: Visit the enchanting Ratargul Swamp Forest and the pristine Bholaganj Sada Pathor in Sylhet.
about_tour: Discover the natural wonders of Sylhet in a day with this tour. Explore the lush Ratargul Swamp Forest and witness the beauty of Bholaganj Sada Pathor.

name: Sylhet Waterways Exploration
tour_plan: Day 1: Explore the vibrant markets and cultural landmarks of Sylhet.
Day 2: Embark on a scenic journey through the waterways and visit local attractions.
Day 3: Conclude the trip with a relaxing day, exploring nature and enjoying local cuisine.
about_tour: Immerse yourself in the enchanting landscapes and rich culture of Sylhet over a 3-day waterways exploration. From bustling markets to serene waterways, this tour offers a comprehensive experience of the region's beauty and heritage.

name: Tanguar Avijatrik: Luxury Houseboat at Haor
tour_plan: Day 1: Experience the epitome of luxury on a houseboat journey through the picturesque haor (wetland).
about_tour: Indulge in a day of luxury on a houseboat at Sunamganj's serene haor. Revel in the comfort and beauty of Tanguar Avijatrik's luxury houseboat experience.

name: Wildlife Expedition at Rema Kalenga Reserve Forest
tour_plan: Day 1: Embark on an exciting wildlife safari in Rema Kalenga Reserve Forest.
Day 2: Explore the diverse flora and fauna of the reserve and engage in wildlife photography.
about_tour: Join us on a 2-day wildlife expedition to Rema Kalenga Reserve Forest in Sylhet. Experience the thrill of a safari and capture the beauty of the region's unique wildlife.
